text.autoconfig.beaconwarp.title: Beacon Warp
text.autoconfig.beaconwarp.option.maxBea: The maximum level of layers which should be scanned.
Given the number of possible channels,
there is no reason to turn this above 4.
I would really not recommend changing this...
text.autoconfig.beaconwarp.option.Cooldo: Cooldown length (in ticks) applied after warping
Cooldown length (in ticks) before teleporting with same beacon
Cooldown length (in ticks) before teleporting with same beacon
text.autoconfig.beaconwarp.option.allowR: Enables rotated beacon bases counting as the same base
Enables reflected beacon bases counting as the same base
text.autoconfig.beaconwarp.option.soundA: Sound to play when activating a beacon
text.autoconfig.beaconwarp.option.doAllL: Enables logging for various beacon warp events
